section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
membership: Alianza 4-Unniversidades is a member of YERUN (Young European Research University Network) https://yerun.eu/
goals__remit: ALIANZA 4-UNIVERSIDADES is a strategic association of four leading universities from Madrid and Barcelona committed to the progress of science, dissemination of culture and development of society. Their main aim is to cooperate in a) academic careers and mobility; b) research and teaching projects in the European Research Area; c) enhance and strengthen international relations.
